wordageddon.model

Class UserLeaderboardEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.model.UserLeaderboardEntry

  • public class UserLeaderboardEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a user entry in the global leaderboard system. This Data Transfer Object contains aggregated user statistics for leaderboard display, including username and cumulative points from all game sessions. It provides a lightweight representation optimized for leaderboard queries and ranking calculations.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca
